name: eInkStain
tag_list: resume, portfolio, portfolio-resume, recruiting, job-search, job-match
overview:
Add value to your career by creating a portfolio resume to showcase your career accomplishments, and maximize your potential.

Designed for professionals, the portfolio resume, takes all your career accomplishments, and imbeds them into the body of your resume, so that in one view, your potential or current employer can have an in-depth view into your career background.

eInkStain was built for recruiters, hiring managers, and staffing agencies to have a full view into the career background of a potential candidate when they’re searching for new talent.

Built intuitive to construct, update, and manage, the portfolio resume is a must have for all professionals.
